title: Braindead Jungler like Warwick
body: Easy to gank and easy first clear maybe?

replies.body: hes easy to kite early game and needs friendly CC to close the distance reliably.

It depends on your ELO.
 Personally, I find tank junglers right now brain-dead and free ELO. However; your team will lack damage if your ADC and mid is not reliable. 
If you are below plat, I suggest you play mechanically easy champions as that will allow you to focus mainly on the game and maximize the usage of your game knowledge.
Tank junglers I suggest: Sejuani, Jarvan IV
Carry junglers: Nocturne, Master Yi
